gobblin.source.extractor.hadoop

Class OldApiHadoopFileInputSource<S,D,K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.AbstractSource<S,D>
      • gobblin.source.extractor.hadoop.OldApiHadoopFileInputSource<S,D,K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - output schema type
    D - output data record type
    K - key type expected by the FileInputFormat
    V - value type expected by the FileInputFormat
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source<S,D>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OldApiHadoopTextInputSource, OldApiWritableFileSource

    public abstract class OldApiHadoopFileInputSource<S,D,K,V>
extends AbstractSource<S,D>
    An implementation of Source that uses a Hadoop FileInputFormat to get a FileSplit per Extractor return by getExtractor(WorkUnitState) and a RecordReader to read the FileSplit.

    This class is equivalent to HadoopFileInputSource in terms of functionality except that it uses the old Hadoop API.

    This class can read either keys of type # or values of type # supported by the given FileInputFormat, configurable by HadoopFileInputSource.FILE_INPUT_READ_KEYS_KEY. It will read keys if the property is set to true, otherwise it will read values. By default, it will read values through the given FileInputFormat.

    A concrete implementation of this class should implement getFileInputFormat(State, JobConf) and getExtractor(WorkUnitState, RecordReader, FileSplit, boolean), which returns a OldApiHadoopFileInputExtractor that needs an concrete implementation.

      • getFileInputFormat

        protected FileInputFormat<K,V> getFileInputFormat(State state,
                                                  JobConf jobConf)
        Get a FileInputFormat instance used to get FileSplits and a RecordReader for every FileSplit.

        This default implementation simply creates a new instance of a FileInputFormat class specified using the configuration property HadoopFileInputSource.FILE_INPUT_FORMAT_CLASS_KEY.

        Parameters:
        state - a State object carrying configuration properties
        jobConf - a Hadoop JobConf object carrying Hadoop configurations
        Returns:
        a FileInputFormat instance

      • getExtractor

        protected abstract OldApiHadoopFileInputExtractor<S,D,K,V> getExtractor(WorkUnitState workUnitState,
                                                                        RecordReader<K,V> recordReader,
                                                                        FileSplit fileSplit,
                                                                        boolean readKeys)
        Get a OldApiHadoopFileInputExtractor instance.
        Parameters:
        workUnitState - a WorkUnitState object carrying Gobblin configuration properties
        recordReader - a Hadoop RecordReader object used to read input records
        fileSplit - the FileSplit to read input records from
        readKeys - whether the OldApiHadoopFileInputExtractor should read keys of type #; by default values of type #>V> are read.
        Returns:
        a OldApiHadoopFileInputExtractor instance
